<!-- source-hash: 57095eeab69987b50cdc37af9ffb2189 -->
Maps event domain objects to external API response DTOs and vice versa, providing bidirectional conversion between internal Event entities and client-facing event data structures.

## Key Components

- **toEventResponse()** - Converts single Event entity to EventResponse DTO
- **toEventResponseList()** - Converts list of Event entities to EventResponse DTOs
- **toEventFilterResponse()** - Maps EventFilters to EventFilterResponse DTO
- **toEventsResponse()** - Converts paginated query results to EventsResponse with pagination info
- **toEventFilterOptions()** - Maps EventFilterCriteria to EventFilterOptions for internal filtering
- **toSortInput()** - Converts external SortCriteria to internal SortInput format

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private EventMapper eventMapper;

// Convert single event to response
Event event = eventService.findById(eventId);
EventResponse response = eventMapper.toEventResponse(event);

// Convert paginated results
GenericQueryResult<Event> queryResult = eventService.searchEvents(filters);
EventsResponse eventsResponse = eventMapper.toEventsResponse(queryResult);

// Map filter criteria for internal use
EventFilterCriteria criteria = new EventFilterCriteria();
criteria.setUserIds(Arrays.asList("user1", "user2"));
criteria.setEventTypes(Arrays.asList("LOGIN", "LOGOUT"));
EventFilterOptions options = eventMapper.toEventFilterOptions(criteria);
```

The mapper extends BaseRestMapper to inherit common pagination mapping functionality and follows null-safe patterns throughout all conversion methods.
